> [pineapples](#comment_11_19XCfah7iuo9zYqk7GoTDXVNp4p5BpEH1T): i think we need some sort of tagging system so that people can filter out tags they dont want to see.  this should be implemented on the site level as well as on posts on blogs.  of course this isnt a complete solution because a site owner doesnt have to use the tags but its a step in the right direction.

â€”no tags, site hidden the same as if it were tagged as something you didn't want to see
